name: From Glory To Goo
description:
Expand your colony in a hostile alien environment and ensure you can supply enough shelter, water and power to your colonists.




As your spacecraft is pulled in by the planet more Goo will be drawn to your colony. Hold back the waves and make the most of the time when things are quiet.




Recruit and build a variety of units, some unlockable through research or uniquely available to certain captains.




Expansion is the key to survival. Claim valuable resources, discover wreckage from previous doomed expeditions as well as native aliens to ally or destroy and other secrets to aid you in your fight.

More Features

  • Experience new strategic choices every time you play, with procedurally generated maps across different biomes.
  • Repairing and upgrading your colony ship is the key to survival. Send resources back into space to allow for new modules to be built like manufacturing zones, laboratories and an array of weaponry.
  • Choose from a variety of unique captains that gain experience and level up as the game progresses. Find and unlock new weapons, skills and passive abilities that will assist you in driving back The Goo.
  • Unlock more ships, captains and biomes when you complete objectives whether you win or lose.
  • Multiple factions with units and buildings you can use, ally or destroy depending on your captain and biome.
